title: Gary Cohn-Backed Smartphone Maker Hoyos Integrity Files for Bankruptcy
sub_head: The Fort Lauderdale, Fla., company listed liabilities of $10 million to $50 million
body:
Hoyos Integrity Corp., a security-focused smartphone developer that counts Gary Cohn as adviser and investor, has filed for bankruptcy protection.
The Fort Lauderdale, Fla.-based business sought protection from creditors Thursday in the U.S. Bankruptcy Court in Wilmington, Del. It listed assets of $1 million to $10 million and liabilities of $10 million to $50 million.
